rule: The response must not include more than one word under any circumstances.
output:
CC: Coordinating conjunction
Étrange is an ADJ (Adjective) of the noun "cela". 

(Note: The apostrophe in "étrange" indicates a dropped article, but that's not relevant to determining the part of speech for "étrange")
complianceText:
The chatbot provides both a part-of-speech tag ('CC') and additional explanatory text about the word. The description explicitly states to "return just the tag for the word's part of speech". The additional text violates this rule.
ERR
